mods.name: Rayvens_Ammo
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Improved the damage output of obsidian arrow and cold steel ammo/arrows.

mods.name: Rayvens_Animal_Loot
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Added Super Cool Ice to boss loot table as well as red exotics.

mods.name: Rayvens_Better_Tames
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Credit goes to Sarge. Decreased the levels on the pet from 200 to 100.

mods.name: Rayvens_Bigger_Pouches
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Increased slot size of pouches from 6 to 12.

mods.name: Rayvens_Difficulty
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Increased just the difficulty for hard.

mods.name: Rayvens_Durable_Tools
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Added arctic, desert, titanium tools, platinum plow and seed harvester to the list. Wind Turbine durability also increased. Increased how much milk the milk pail stores.

mods.name: Rayvens_Legendaries
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Changed legendary bow to highlight shot projectile; Added distance to animal highlight; must have sense animal(hunting or module) for this to work. Added Javelin Launcher to the list.

mods.name: Rayvens_Modules
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Buffed up some of the workshop modules.

mods.name: Rayvens_More_Stuff
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Can never have enough stuff crafted.

mods.name: Rayvens_Mounts
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Increased speed of the horse, moa, buffalo and tusker. Increased weight capacity of buffalo, increased health regen on tusker. Takes longer to tame.

mods.name: Rayvens_Saddles
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Used Coracks_Saddle_Improvements as guide. Changed stats on bearhide saddle to match that of the racing saddle to give us a different flavor saddle. Buffed up Armored saddle for the battle ready mounts. Also not everyone has the DLC so I made the basic saddles have the equilavent of the DLC version.

mods.name: Rayvens_Small_Fish_Lure
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Made a stand alone lure catch only small fish for the aquariums.

mods.name: Rayvens_Smelting_Speed
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: This mod increases the smelting speed of the furnace that has the stoking the flames alteration.

mods.name: Rayvens_stacks_2.5k
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Added Zailfyers charcoal and ash to the list. Must be last to load on the list for this to work properly.

mods.name: Rayvens_Workshop
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Added chac pistol to the list, made changes to ammo capacity and reload speed.
